snippet: The Rangers said Sean Avery would be left off the postseason roster of their A.H.L. affiliate, the Connecticut Whale, effectively ending Avery’s tenure with the organization.
abstract: The Rangers said Sean Avery would be left off the postseason roster of their A.H.L. affiliate, the Connecticut Whale, effectively ending Avery’s tenure with the organization.

headline.main: Rangers' Split With Avery Is Nearly Complete
